unnormalised: Arey bhai, coaching classes for IIT-JEE cost more than my entire B.Tech degree did! Guess I should've just preponed cracking the exam and avoided the "engineering" fees altogether, lol.
normalised: Oh brother, coaching classes for I-I-T J-E-E cost more than my entire B-Tech degree did! Guess I should have just preponed cracking the exam and avoided the "engineering" fees altogether, laughing out loud.
